column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The place is a bit pricey
column2: but you honestly can't be stingy with your wallet with an establishment that really shines through each individually
column3: crafted pastry. You can tell that detail matters to them. Not only are their foods a work of art
column4: the packaging and place itself is visually pleasing and capturing. I promise you won't be let down. I hope you enjoyed this place just as much as I did!
